title.rendered: STEDI SURFACE 6 LED RGB ROCK LIGHTS

content.rendered:
We refer to our new 6 Piece RGB LEDs kit as Rock Lights, but the application for these lights is as massive as your imagination. Plug & Play Universal LED Fog Light Kit

RGB ROCK LIGHTS PHONE APP CONTROLLED

SET OF 6

OVERVIEW

Download the FREE Android or App Store app and all of sudden you can now pick from literally millions of colour combination. Switch to amber to keep the bugs away at camp? No problem. Too bright? No problem the app allows you to control brightness.

PERFORMANCE

Each Rock Light emits a smooth even beam while still having incredibly low power draw. We’ve tested these to the IP69K standard, meaning not only can they be fully immersed in water, but they can also withstand high-pressure spray downs.

APPLICATION

These little puppies come in handy more than one would think to be so small and the ability for endless installation locations. Providing the perfect amount of brightness to bring sufficient visibility to areas where you sometimes may not have the room for large work lights. Commonly used for lighting for Boats, Camping, Vehicle Tub, Wheels wells.

DETAILS

STEDI multi-function, multi-colour RGB Rock Lights com included with a full wiring harness as well and a Bluetooth wireless controller. Simply download our free Android or App Store app, which will allow you to choose between 5 primary colours as well as infinite shade variations.  The Bluetooth app allows you to customise brightness, colours or flash function.

APPLICATION 

  • Engine Bay Lights
  • Rock Crawling Light
  • Reverse Assist Lights
  • On Deck or Side Rail Lights for Marine
  • Rear Cargo or Canopy Lights

KEY TECHNICAL DETAILS 

  • Abrasion Resistant Lens and Finish
  • IP69K Standard (Bluetooth module rated to IP66 – Splash Proof. We recommend fitment away from the elements)
  • Environmentally sealed automotive connectors
  • 6 to 1 Connector Included
  • High-Performance Philips LEDs
  • 50,000 hours Lifespan
  • 2 Year Warranty
  • Rubber Mounting Base
  • The cable can exit from rear or side.
  • Rock light Cable Length 2 @ 5m Each Rock Light 4 @ 3.5m Length 

 

SPECIFICATIONS

HOUSING MATERIAL Aluminium
LED RGB
COMPATIBLE VOLTAGE 9v to 24v DC
RED LUMENS 283LM (each)
GREEN LUMENS 498LM (each)
BLUE LUMENS 201LM (each)
AMBER LUMENS 244LM (each)
LIFESPAN 50,000hours
CURRENT DRAW 0.3a @ 13.6v  (each)
BEAM ANGLE 120 Degrees
CONNECTOR TYPE Sealed
CERTIFICATION CE, E4, RoHs, R87, IP69K

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 6 x STEDI LED RGB Rock Lights
  • 6 in 1 Connector Connectors and Wire
  • Bluetooth Junction Box
  • 6 Rubber Pads with Stainless Screws & Bolts
  • Instructions Manual

excerpt.rendered: Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
